full_summary:
**Title**
Spares for Distributed Antenna Subsystem (DAS) for HFX Class Ships

**Notice Number**
cb-790-72037803

**Call for Submissions**
The Department of National Defence invites proposals for the procurement of spare parts for the Distributed Antenna Subsystem (DAS) for HFX class ships.

**Requirements**
The following items are required:

* Item 1: Connector, Plugin, Electrical (NCAGE: 68999, TC-240-NMH-X)
	+ Quantity: 210 EA
	+ Unit of Issue: Each
	+ Delivery Location: CFB Halifax
* Item 2: Connector, Plugin, Electrical (NCAGE: Z2D12, TC-240-NMH-X)
	+ Quantity: 140 EA
	+ Unit of Issue: Each
	+ Delivery Location: CFB Esquimalt
* Item 3: Switch, Antenna Unit (NCAGE: 04KW9, MFJ-2702N)
	+ Quantity: 5 EA
	+ Unit of Issue: Each
	+ Delivery Location: CFB Halifax
* Item 4: Switch, Antenna Unit (NCAGE: 04KW9, MFJ-2702N)
	+ Quantity: 3 EA
	+ Unit of Issue: Each
	+ Delivery Location: CFB Esquimalt
* ...

**Delivery and Payment Terms**
* Delivery of items is to be made to CFB Halifax and CFB Esquimalt.
* Prices must be submitted in Canadian dollars. Bids submitted in foreign currency will be rejected.
* A preference is given to Canadian goods.

**Proposal Submission**
Proposals may be submitted in either official language of Canada (English or French). To ensure comparability of bids, all proposals must be submitted in electronic format through the Canada Buy Service.

**Evaluation Criteria**
Proposals will be evaluated on the basis of lowest price.

**Deadline for Proposal Submission**
The deadline for proposal submission is April 28, 2024, at 2:00 PM Eastern Daylight Time (EDT).

**Contact Information**
For further information, please contact Chun Kau Tang at (613) 606-8986 or [chunkau.tang@forces.gc.ca](mailto:chunkau.tang@forces.gc.ca).
